text: Kim Hye-song may refer to: * Kim Hye-song (boxer) (born 1984), North Korean female boxer * Kim Hye-song (gymnast) (born 1997), North Korean female acrobatic gymnast * Kim Hye-song (runner) (born 1993), North Korean female long-distance runner * Kim Hye-song (table tennis), North Korean female table tennis player * Kim Hye-seong (born 1988), South Korean actor
title: Kim Hye-song
